long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Splashpad replaces the default new tab page with a widget-based dashboard. You can create sticky notes, customize your wallpaper, write motivational messages to yourself, etc.

Highlighted Features
=================
Widgets
  - Clock
  - Searchbar
  - Sticky Notes
  - Iframe
  - Spotify embed
  - Text

Privacy
  - Splashpad does not use analytics or store your data on any servers

Splashpad is under active development! If you would like to see new features, or if you'd like to help develop Splashpad or develop widgets for Splashpad, contact splashpadextension@gmail.com.
